thread.title: Tennessee linebacker Sapp out with stress fracture in foot
thread.title_full: Tennessee linebacker Sapp out with stress fracture in foot

title: Tennessee linebacker Sapp out with stress fracture in foot
text: KNOXVILLE, Tenn. -- Tennessee reserve linebacker Quart'e Sapp is out indefinitely with a stress fracture in his foot. Volunteers coach Butch Jones announced Sapp's injury Wednesday and said that he "can't really put a time frame on" how much time Sapp would miss. Sapp, who is from Alpharetta, Georgia, played in each of Tennessee's first four games and made three tackles. Tennessee (2-2, 0-1 SEC) hosts Arkansas (1-3, 0-1) on Saturday. Jones said wide receiver Alton "Pig" Howard's status remains uncertain for the Arkansas game. Howard missed the Vols' 28-27 loss to Florida last week with an injury that hasn't been specified. ___ AP college football website: collegefootball.ap.org Share this page
